channel.title: Xinyu Liu on Network of Philosophers
channel.description: Recent content in Xinyu Liu on Network of Philosophers

item.title: Connections among attributes
item.description: This page shows the analysis of connections among fields, theories and eras. Philosophy has many fields and has born many theories, if one field connects strongly with one or some specific theories? In other words, if one philosopher belong to one field prefers to research one or specific theories? In addition, did philosophy change a lot with time going on? If some theories or fields just created or being popular in recent years? One weight network is built to analyse the connections among these three attributes. The following is the result and how I found itðŸ˜Ž.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
